thread.title: Herts man walks the entire British coastline with his new heart
thread.title_full: Herts man walks the entire British coastline with his new heart | Anglia - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Herts man walks the entire British coastline with his new heart
text:
Seven years ago Keiran Sandwell from Berkhamstead in Hertfordshire could barely walk a few yards, never mind a few miles.
Now he is walking all the way around the United Kingdom.
See ITV Anglia reporter, Kate Prout's report on Keiran's walk by clicking below
Play video He was born with a congenital heart defect and at the age of 38 was finally given a new heart.
Now he's embarked on a 5,000 mile walk around the British coastline hoping to raise Â£100,000 for the British Heart Foundation.
It's going to take him 326 days.
For more details on his trip and how to support him click here
Last updated Tue 21 Feb 2017 And Finally British Heart Foundation Hertfordshire
